Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils

Class BleScanRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.BleScanRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    public final class BleScanRecord
extends Object
implements UsesCustomNull
    Class used to store information from a BLE scan record. This class can also be used to create a scan record.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BleScanRecord.Option
      Enumeration for advertising options

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static BleScanRecord NULL

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BleScanRecord()
      Basic constructor to use if you are building a scan record to advertise.

      Old Constructor used to be used internally when a BleDevice is discovered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BleScanRecord addManufacturerData​(short manId, byte[] data)
      Add some manufacturer data, along with the given manufacturer id to the backing List.
      BleScanRecord addServiceData​(Map<UUID,​byte[]> data)
      Set the service data for this BleScanRecord instance.
      BleScanRecord addServiceData​(UUID uuid, byte[] data)
      Add the given UUID and data to this instance's service data map.
      BleScanRecord addServiceUuid​(UUID uuid)
      Overload of addServiceUuid(UUID, BleUuid.UuidSize), which sets the size to BleUuid.UuidSize.SHORT, if it can fit, otherwise it will default to BleUuid.UuidSize.FULL
      BleScanRecord addServiceUuid​(UUID uuid, BleUuid.UuidSize size)
      Add a UUID with the given BleUuid.UuidSize to this instance's UUID list.
      BleScanRecord addServiceUUIDs​(List<UUID> uuids)
      Add the given List of UUIDs to this instance's UUID list.
      byte[] buildPacket()
      Build a byte[] scan record from the data stored in this instance.
      BleScanRecord clearServiceData()
      Clear all service data that may be in this BleScanRecord instance.
      BleScanRecord clearServiceUUIDs()
      Clears any service UUIDs in this instance.
      Pointer<Integer> getAdvFlags()
      Get the advertising flags for this instance.
      byte[] getManufacturerData()
      Get the manufacturer data from this instance.
      List<ManufacturerData> getManufacturerDataList()
      Returns a List of all manufacturer data parsed in the scan record.
      short getManufacturerId()
      Get the manufacturer Id from this BleScanRecord instance.
      String getName()
      Returns the device name
      Map<UUID,​byte[]> getServiceData()
      Returns a Map of the service data in this instance.

      Returns a list of service UUIDs.
      Pointer<Integer> getTxPower()
      Gets the Tx power
      boolean hasUuid​(UUID uuid)
      Returns true if this advertising packet contains the uuid given.
      boolean includesDeviceName()
      Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the device name included or not.
      boolean includesTxPowerLevel()
      Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the TX Power level included or not.
      boolean isConnectable()
      Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the connectable flag set or not.
      boolean isNull()
      Returns true if this instance is considered null.
      boolean isShortName()
      Returns whether the name is a shortened version or not.
      BleScanRecord setAdvFlags​(byte mask)
      Set the advertising flags.
      BleScanRecord setAdvFlags​(byte... flags)
      Convenience method to set the advertising flags, which allows you to pass in every flag you want, and this method will OR them together for you.

      Sets this BleScanRecord's manufacturer data list.

                     byte[] mfgData,

        Old Constructor used to be used internally when a BleDevice is discovered. Now, BleScanRecord(Pointer, Pointer, List, boolean, List, Map, String, boolean) is used instead.

    • Method Detail

      • clearServiceData

        public final BleScanRecord clearServiceData()
        Clear all service data that may be in this BleScanRecord instance. See also clearServiceUUIDs().

      • addServiceData

        public final BleScanRecord addServiceData​(Map<UUID,​byte[]> data)
        Set the service data for this BleScanRecord instance.

      • setOptions

        public final BleScanRecord setOptions​(BleScanRecord.Option... options)
        Set the options for this scan record. This only applies when this class is used with BleServer to advertise itself.
        See Also:
        BleScanRecord.Option

      • isConnectable

        public final boolean isConnectable()
        Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the connectable flag set or not.

      • includesTxPowerLevel

        public final boolean includesTxPowerLevel()
        Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the TX Power level included or not.

      • includesDeviceName

        public final boolean includesDeviceName()
        Returns whether the resulting advertising packet will have the device name included or not.

      • clearServiceUUIDs

        public final BleScanRecord clearServiceUUIDs()
        Clears any service UUIDs in this instance.

        public final BleScanRecord addServiceUUIDs​(List<UUID> uuids)
        Add the given List of UUIDs to this instance's UUID list.

        Add the given UUID and data to this instance's service data map.

      • addServiceUuid

                                          BleUuid.UuidSize size)
        Add a UUID with the given BleUuid.UuidSize to this instance's UUID list.

      • addServiceUuid

        public final BleScanRecord addServiceUuid​(UUID uuid)
        Overload of addServiceUuid(UUID, BleUuid.UuidSize), which sets the size to BleUuid.UuidSize.SHORT, if it can fit, otherwise it will default to BleUuid.UuidSize.FULL

      • addManufacturerData

        public final BleScanRecord addManufacturerData​(short manId,
                                               byte[] data)
        Add some manufacturer data, along with the given manufacturer id to the backing List.

      • setManufacturerDataList

        public final BleScanRecord setManufacturerDataList​(List<ManufacturerData> list)
        Sets this BleScanRecord's manufacturer data list. This creates a new list from the one given.

      • setName

        public final BleScanRecord setName​(String name)
        Overload of setName(String, boolean), which defaults to a complete name (not short).

      • setName

        public final BleScanRecord setName​(String name,
                                   boolean shortName)
        Set the device name, and if it's a shortened name or not.

      • getManufacturerId

        public final short getManufacturerId()
        Get the manufacturer Id from this BleScanRecord instance. This is a convenience method. This simply returns the first item in the List holding all manufacturer data.
        See Also:
        getManufacturerDataList()

      • getManufacturerData

        public final byte[] getManufacturerData()
        Get the manufacturer data from this instance. This is a convenience method. This simply returns the first item in the List holding all manufacturer data.
        See Also:
        getManufacturerDataList()

      • getManufacturerDataList

        public final List<ManufacturerData> getManufacturerDataList()
        Returns a List of all manufacturer data parsed in the scan record.

      • setAdvFlags

        public final BleScanRecord setAdvFlags​(byte mask)
        Set the advertising flags. This method expects a byte bitmask (so all flags are already OR'd).

      • setAdvFlags

        public final BleScanRecord setAdvFlags​(byte... flags)
        Convenience method to set the advertising flags, which allows you to pass in every flag you want, and this method will OR them together for you.

      • getAdvFlags

        public final Pointer<Integer> getAdvFlags()
        Get the advertising flags for this instance.

      • setTxPower

        public final BleScanRecord setTxPower​(byte power)
        Set the TX power

      • getTxPower

        public final Pointer<Integer> getTxPower()
        Gets the Tx power

      • getServiceUUIDS

        public final List<UUID> getServiceUUIDS()
        Returns a list of service UUIDs. This ONLY includes UUIDs that do NOT have any data associated with them. See also getServiceData().

      • getServiceData

        public final Map<UUID,​byte[]> getServiceData()
        Returns a Map of the service data in this instance. See also getServiceUUIDS().

      • getName

        public final String getName()
        Returns the device name

      • isShortName

        public final boolean isShortName()
        Returns whether the name is a shortened version or not.

        Returns true if this instance is considered null.
